categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Wave X

nodes.text: The TIE Striker Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features a detailed miniature of the TIE/sk x1 experimental air superiority fighter from the film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. It was released on February 2, 2017 as part of the game's tenth wave of expansions.

The sleek and agile TIE striker was developed primarily by Imperial forces stationed on planetary installations, where its adaptive ailerons and potent weaponry made it an excellent safeguard against Rebel incursions. The TIE striker and its adaptive ailerons come to life with the TIE Striker Expansion Pack for X-Wing™. It contains one highly detailed and pre-painted miniature TIE striker, along with six ship cards and three upgrades. These reflect the ship's exceptional atmospheric maneuverability, as well as its use in Imperial swarm tactics.
The TIE Striker Expansion Pack contains a miniature of the TIE striker, plus two maneuver dials and action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
